TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XmlSchemaComplexType extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType

summary.span: 按 WWW 联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式显示 来自 XML 架构的元素。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 此类定义一个复杂类型，它确定特性集和元素的内容。

span.span: This class defines a complex type that determines the set of attributes and content of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用引用`complexType`元素 (该元素是定义元素的结构、内容和属性的元素) 的类型属性来声明元素。An element can be declared with a type attribute that refers to a `complexType` element that defines the structure, content, and attributes of that element. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个`complexType`元素。The following example creates a `complexType` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/CPP/complextype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/CS/complextype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/VB/complextype.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件用于前面的代码示例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

The component of the complex type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性不为 null, 则复杂类型可以包含中指定的命名空间中的任何属性。If this property is not null, the complex type can contain any attributes from the namespaces specified in the .

span.span: Gets the collection of attributes for the complex type.
Contains and classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeUses As XmlSchemaObjectTable
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaObjectTable ^ AttributeUses { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaObjectTable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该复杂类型及其基类型的所有符合特性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of all the complied attributes of this complex type and its base types.

value.span: 来自该复杂类型和其基类型的所有特性的集合。

span.span: The collection of all the attributes from this complex type and its base types.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 来自层次结构中每种类型的`Attributes`属性的所有属性的组合。For example, a combination of all the attributes from the `Attributes` property from each type in the hierarchy. 此属性的值是只读的。The value of this property is read-only. 此属性的值在成功编译架构后, 可确定实例文档中允许的完整属性集。This property has the value after the schema has been successfully compiled to determine the complete attribute set that is allowed in an instance document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeWildcard As XmlSchemaAnyAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取该复杂类型及其基类型的 的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for for this complex type and its base type(s).
The post-compilation value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值是只读的。The value of this property is read-only. 此属性在架构已成功编译后具有值, 以确定复杂类型的完整属性集。This property has values after the schema has been successfully compiled to determine the complete attribute set of the complex type. 例如, 它可能是一个基`anyAttribute`类型中的元素。For example, it might be the `anyAttribute` element from one of the base types.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod Block { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute.

value.span: 特性禁止在指定的派生类型中使用复杂类型。

span.span: The attribute prevents a complex type from being used in the specified type of derivation.
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示派生的类型。Indicates the type of derivation. 此属性可以包含以下值:This attribute can contain the following values: |EnumEnum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用架构的`BlockDefault`属性定义的派生限制 (如果存在)。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Extension`|此元素不能替换为通过扩展派生的类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能由限制派生的类型替换。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 无论使用何种派生方法, 都无法将此元素替换为任何类型。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| 此属性`List`不支持`Union` 、和派生方法。 `Substitution`The `Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not supported by this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlockResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 在已将类型编译为架构验证后信息集之后获取值。

span.span: Gets the value after the type has been compiled to the post-schema-validation information set (infoset).

summary.span: 该值指示在实例文档中使用 时如何强制类型。

span.span: This value indicates how the type is enforced when is used in the instance document.
The post-schema-validated infoset value.

value.span: 默认为 元素中的 值。

span.span: The default is value on the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值来自类型本身, 或者, 如果未在类型级别上定义, 则从`schema`元素中获取。This value is taken either from the type itself or, if not defined at the type level, it is taken from the `schema` element. 例如, 如果值受到限制, 则只能使用明确定义的类型, 而不能使用从专门定义的类型派生的类型。For example, if the value is restricted, only the specifically defined type can be used, not types derived from the specifically defined type. 此属性可以包含以下值:This attribute can contain the following values: |EnumEnum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用架构的`BlockDefault`属性定义的派生限制 (如果存在)。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Extension`|此元素不能替换为通过扩展派生的类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能由限制派生的类型替换。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 无论使用何种派生方法, 都无法将此元素替换为任何类型。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| 此属性`List`不支持`Union` 、和派生方法。 `Substitution`The `Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not supported by this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置该复杂类型的编译后 。

span.span: Gets or sets the post-compilation of this complex type.

value.span: 内容模型类型，它是 或 类之一。

span.span: The content model type that is one of the or classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这与属性互相排斥。This is mutually exclusive with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As XmlSchemaContentType
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaContentType ContentType { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaContentType get(); };

summary.span: 获取复杂类型的内容模型，它保存编译后值。

span.span: Gets the content model of the complex type which holds the post-compilation value.

value.span: 复杂类型的内容模型的编译后值。

span.span: The post-compilation value of the content model for the complex type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是架构验证后信息集中的内容。This is the content in the post-schema-validation infoset. `ContentModel` `true` `Mixed`如果属性在类型为的属性上设置为,则返回的值为。`XmlSchemaComplexContent` `IsMixed`If the `IsMixed` property is set to `true` on the `ContentModel` property that has the type `XmlSchemaComplexContent`, the value returned is `Mixed`. 如果属性为`false`,则值为`ElementOnly`或。`Empty` `IsMixed`If the `IsMixed` property is `false`, the value is either `Empty` or `ElementOnly`. 如果`ContentModel`属性上的类型具有类型`XmlSchemaSimpleContent`, 则此值始终`TextOnly`为。If the type on the `ContentModel` property has the type `XmlSchemaSimpleContent`, then this value is always `TextOnly`. 该`ContentType`属性必须具有下表中显示的值之一。The `ContentType` property must have one of the values shown in the following table. |EnumEnum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`TextOnly`|纯文本内容。Text-only content.| |`Empty`|空内容。Empty content.| |`ElementOnly`|纯元素内容。Element-only content.| |`Mixed`|混合内容模型。Mixed content model.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentTypeParticle As XmlSchemaParticle
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ ContentTypeParticle { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取保存 粒子的编译后值的粒子。

span.span: Gets the particle that holds the post-compilation value of the particle.
The particle for the content type.
The post-compilation value of the particle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ContentTypeParticle`是在根据 W3C XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 规范中定义的规则解析出最多派生类型和基本复杂类型的内容模型后确定的。This `ContentTypeParticle` is determined after the content models of the most derived types and the base complex type have been resolved according to the rules defined in the W3C XML Schema definition language (XSD) specification.

span.span: Gets or sets the information that determines if the element can be used in the instance document.

value.span: 如果为 ，则元素不可以直接使用该 元素，而是必须使用从该 元素中派生的复杂类型。

span.span: If , an element cannot use this element directly and must use a complex type that is derived from this element.
The default is .
Optional.

summary.span: 获取或设置信息，该信息确定复杂类型是否具有混合内容模型（内容中的标记）。

span.span: Gets or sets information that determines if the complex type has a mixed content model (markup within the content).

value.span: 如果字符数据可以出现在此复杂类型的子元素之间，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if character data can appear between child elements of this complex type; otherwise, .
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示字符数据是否可以出现在此`complexType`的子元素之间。Indicates if character data can appear between the child elements of this `complexType`. 如果元素为子元素`mixed` , 则不允许使用属性 (`false`)。 `simpleContent`If the `simpleContent` element is a child element, the `mixed` attribute is not allowed (`false`). 如果该`complexContent`元素是一个子元素`mixed` , 则该属性`mixed`可以`complexContent`由元素上的特性重写。If the `complexContent` element is a child element, the `mixed` attribute can be overridden by the `mixed` attribute on the `complexContent` element.

summary.span: 获取组合类型或将其设置为 、、 或 类之一。

span.span: Gets or sets the compositor type as one of the , , , or classes.
The compositor type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 粒子必须为下列排序器之一:Particles must be one of the following compositors: |元素Element|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`group`|该复杂类型包含在引用组中定义的元素。The complex type contains the elements defined in the referenced group.| |`sequence`|该复杂类型包含在指定序列中定义的元素。The complex type contains the elements defined in the specified sequence.| |`choice`|复杂类型允许在`choice`元素中指定的元素之一。The complex type allows one of the elements specified in the `choice` element.| |`all`|复杂类型允许在`all`元素中指定的所有元素出现一次或根本不显示。The complex type allows all of the elements specified in the `all` element to appear once or not at all.| 这与属性互相排斥。This is mutually exclusive with the property.
